name: Calculator
description: A simple and beautiful calculator with offline support. Perfect for quick calculations on the go with a clean interface.

name: Todo List
description: Keep track of your tasks with this elegant todo app. Works offline and syncs automatically when online. Never forget a task!

name: 2048 Game
description: Classic 2048 puzzle game. Slide tiles to reach 2048 and beyond. Fully playable offline with smooth animations!

name: Photo Editor
description: Edit photos with filters, effects, and adjustments. All processing done locally in your browser. No uploads needed!

name: Notes
description: Simple note-taking app with markdown support. Organize your thoughts and ideas with ease. Auto-saves everything!

name: Weather
description: Check weather forecasts for your location. Beautiful interface with detailed weather information and 7-day forecast.

name: Timer
description: Countdown timer and stopwatch for productivity. Perfect for time management, workouts, and cooking!

name: Drawing Pad
description: Digital drawing pad with multiple brushes and colors. Create art, doodle, or sketch on the go. Save your masterpieces!
